subject: Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: The Australian Daniel Ricciardo of Red Bull, 24, and the rookie Russian Daniil Kvyat of Toro Rosso, 20, are the revelations of the 2014 Formula One season after six races.
snippet: The Australian Daniel Ricciardo of Red Bull, 24, and the rookie Russian Daniil Kvyat of Toro Rosso, 20, are the revelations of the 2014 Formula One season after six races.
